What is Haos?

Haos is a chaotic fast-paced top down shooter mixed with dungeon-crawling in a unique minimal neon style! Enter the haos, kill enemies, collect resources and weapon drops, equip better weapons and upgrade your character, dive into a more challenging depth for better drops and rewards, repeat endlessly. 

FREE ALPHA DEMO VERSION

The demo version is so you can get a taste of a potential endgame game play and feel the satisfaction destroying huge mob of enemies.
Any feedback-suggestion on the comment section is appreciated.
Enjoy :)

How to play | Demo Version

Enter The Haos, kill the enemies until the top progress bar goes to 100%, return to the Main Menu with R, repeat on a higher depth.

Keybinds:

WASDMoveLeft Mouse ButtonFireRReturn to HQ

Key Features

  • 100% Procedural generated "caves" - Every run is unique.
  • 100+ hours of crawling and grinding.


Planned to come

  • Many different types of weapons for every play style!
  • Many different types for enemies for more chaos!
  • Weapons get random event mod applied when dropped!
  • Different types of dungeons for dungeon-crawling!

Support The Development

Do you want to support the development of the game because you like it or you think it has potential of becoming a nice game? You can! How? You can support it financially by  donating on PayPal  or you can support non-financially by sharing the game with your friends/communities, live streaming or uploading game play videos to platforms (YouTube, Twitch, etc.), reporting bugs and glitches, proposing new ideas and giving feedback.
